Class SoaNewsListerScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.events.SoaNewsListerScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SoaTaskScheduler

    public class SoaNewsListerScheduler
extends Object
implements SoaTaskScheduler
    Handles the scheduling for the SoaNewsLister automated task

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void rescheduleTask()
      Cancel the existing timer and then call scheduleTask to schedule the next run of the task.
      void scheduleTask()
      Schedule the next run of the task to be 30 minutes from the previous.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoaNewsListerScheduler

        public SoaNewsListerScheduler(sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient client,
                              String url)
        Creates a SoaNewsListerScheduler. Task must be scheduled by calling the scheduleTask method.
        Parameters:
        client - Discord Client to be used by the task.
        url - URL to the events RSS feed from the SoA forum calendar

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleTask

        public void scheduleTask()
        Schedule the next run of the task to be 30 minutes from the previous.
